participants.name: Gordon Addie
participants.title: Technical Recruiter- International Consumer at Amazon

messages.message:
Software Development Engineer positions- Amazon Ireland

Dear Brian, 

Apologies for the direct contact but I found your profile and was keen to reach out to you directly.

We are currently hiring for a number of senior Software Development Engineer positions, aswell as Technical Program Manager + SW Development Manager roles.

Please see a direct link through to the SW Development Engineer position as advertised on our website- https://www.amazon.jobs/en/jobs/462994

If these types of opportunities might be of interest, then please let me know? I would be excited to discuss these further with you.

Best Regards,

Gordon

Gordon Addie
addieg@amazon.com
Thank you for connecting! I'd love to work for Amazon.
